name: deployments
title: Deployments
description: Table with camera trap deployments. Includes `deploymentID`, start, end, location and camera setup information.

fields.name: deploymentID
fields.description: Unique identifier of the deployment.

fields.name: locationID
fields.description: Unique identifier of the deployment location.

fields.name: locationName
fields.description: Name given to the deployment location.

fields.name: longitude
fields.description: Longitude of the deployment location in decimal degrees, using the WGS84 datum.

fields.name: latitude
fields.description: Latitude of the deployment location in decimal degrees, using the WGS84 datum.

fields.name: coordinateUncertainty
fields.description: Horizontal distance in meters from the given `latitude` and `longitude` describing the smallest circle containing the deployment location. Especially relevant when coordinates are rounded to protect sensitive species.

fields.name: start
fields.description: Date and time at which the deployment was started. Formatted as an ISO 8601 string with timezone designator (`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` or `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm`).

fields.name: end
fields.description: Date and time at which the deployment was ended. Formatted as an ISO 8601 string with timezone designator (`YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ` or `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh:mm`).

fields.name: setupBy
fields.description: Name or unique identifier of the person that deployed the camera.

fields.name: cameraID
fields.description: Unique identifier of the camera used for the deployment (e.g. the camera device serial number).

fields.name: cameraModel
fields.description: Manufacturer and model of the camera. Formatted as `manufacturer-model`.

fields.name: cameraInterval
fields.description: Time specified between shutter triggers when activity in the sensor will not trigger the shutter. Expressed in seconds.

fields.name: cameraHeight
fields.description: Height at which the camera was deployed. Expressed in meters.

fields.name: cameraTilt
fields.description: Angle at which the camera was deployed in the vertical plane. Expressed in degrees, with `-90` facing down, `0` horizontal and `90` facing up.

fields.name: cameraHeading
fields.description: Angle at which the camera was deployed in the horizontal plane. Expressed in decimal degrees clockwise from north, with values ranging from `0` to `360`: `0` = north, `90` = east, `180` = south, `270` = west.

fields.name: detectionDistance
fields.description: Furthest distance at which the camera detected a human during setup.

fields.name: timestampIssues
fields.description: `true` if timestamps in the `media` and `observations` resources for the deployment are known to have (unsolvable) issues (e.g. unknown timezone, am/pm switch).

fields.name: baitUse
fields.description: `true` if bait was used for the deployment. More information can be provided in `tags` or `comments`.

fields.name: featureType
fields.description: Type of the feature (if any) associated with the deployment.

fields.name: habitat
fields.description: Short characterization of the habitat at the deployment location.

fields.name: deploymentGroup
fields.description: Deployment group(s) associated with the deployment. Deployment groups can have a spatial (arrays, grids, clusters), temporal (sessions, seasons, months, years) or other context. Formatted as a pipe (`|`) separated list for multiple values, with values preferably formatted as `key:value` pairs.

fields.name: tags
fields.description: Tag(s) associated with the deployment. Formatted as a pipe (`|`) separated list for multiple values, with values optionally formatted as `key:value` pairs.

fields.name: comments
fields.description: Comments or notes about the deployment.
